name: Sleep Paralysis (Veguista)
description:
Press Space to blink.

"You will not fear the nightmares when you don't see them".

The Downloadable version includes the final cinematic and the rain particles which are gliched on the HTML5 version.

Originally the game used Google's Resonance Audio Plugin to create a 3D audio environment. However, it turns out Resonance does not work at all when building Unity projects :).

I had to remove the plugin and, even though the result is much less engaging, at this point I'm just happy this project is done.

Made for the Two-Minute Horror Jam (Hosted by Kuremento).

This is a list of the Creative Commons resources used in the project:
